textTemplates.name: box
textTemplates.text:
Client & Tour

{!Opportunity.Account.Name} - {!Opportunity.Name}

예산 (Budget)

{!Opportunity.Budget_Max__c}

인원 (Headcount)

{!Opportunity.Headcount__c} 명

SDR 인계 사항

{!Opportunity.SDR_Handover_Note__c}

희망 지점/호실

{!Opportunity.Branch_Account__r.Name} / {!Opportunity.Asset__r.Name}

투어 날짜: {!Opportunity.Tour_Date__c} 선호 상담: {!Opportunity.Preferred_Consult_Time__c} 선호 입주: {!Opportunity.Preferred_MoveIn_Date__c}

핵심 니즈 & 선호사항

{!Opportunity.Description} (선호: {!Opportunity.Preferences__c})

textTemplates.name: box2
textTemplates.text:
Client & Tour

{!Opportunity.Account.Name} - {!Opportunity.Name}

핵심 니즈 & 선호사항

{!Opportunity.Description} (선호: {!Opportunity.Preferences__c})

SDR 인계 사항

{!Opportunity.SDR_Handover_Note__c}

textTemplates.name: box3
textTemplates.text:
<div style="background-color: #ffffff; border: 1px solid #e0e0e0; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Salesforce Sans', sans-serif; padding: 24px; box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%;">


<!-- Section 1: 타이틀 -->

<div>

<p style="font-size: 11px; color: #54698d; margin: 0 0 2px 0; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.5px;">Client & Tour</p>

<h2 style="margin: 0; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; color: #080707;">{!Opportunity.Account.Name} - {!Opportunity.Name}</h2>

</div>


<hr style="border: 0; border-top: 1px solid #e0e0e0; margin: 20px 0;">


<!-- Section 2: 핵심 정보 (4단 구성으로 변경) -->

<table style="width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; margin-bottom: 20px;">

<tr>

<td style="width: 25%; vertical-align: top; padding-right: 12px;">

<p style="font-size: 12px; color: #54698d; margin: 0 0 4px 0;">예산 (Budget)</p>

<p style="font-size: 18px; font-weight: 500; color: #080707; margin: 0;">{!Opportunity.Budget_Max__c}</p>

</td>

<td style="width: 25%; vertical-align: top; padding-left: 12px;">

<p style="font-size: 12px; color: #54698d; margin: 0 0 4px 0;">인원 (Headcount)</p>

<p style="font-size: 18px; font-weight: 500; color: #080707; margin: 0;">{!Opportunity.Headcount__c} 명</p>

</td>

<td style="width: 50%; vertical-align: top; padding-left: 24px; border-left: 1px solid #e0e0e0;">

<p style="font-size: 12px; color: #54698d; margin: 0 0 4px 0;">희망 지점/호실</p>

<p style="font-size: 14px; font-weight: 500; color: #080707; margin: 0;">{!Opportunity.Branch_Account__r.Name} / {!Opportunity.Asset__r.Name}</p>

</td>

</tr>

</table>


<table style="width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 13px;">

<tr>

<td style="width: 33.3%;"><b>투어 날짜:</b> {!Opportunity.Tour_Date__c}</td>

<td style="width: 33.3%;"><b>선호 상담:</b> {!Opportunity.Preferred_Consult_Time__c}</td>

<td style="width: 33.3%;"><b>선호 입주:</b> {!Opportunity.Preferred_MoveIn_Date__c}</td>

</tr>

</table>

<hr style="border: 0; border-top: 1px solid #e0e0e0; margin: 20px 0;">


<!-- Section 3: 니즈 & 노트 -->

<div>

<p style="font-size: 12px; color: #54698d; margin: 0 0 4px 0;">핵심 니즈 & 선호사항</p>

<p style="font-size: 14px; color: #080707; margin: 0 0 20px 0;"><b>{!Opportunity.Description}</b> (선호: {!Opportunity.Preferences__c})</p>


<div style="background-color: #f3f3f3; padding: 16px; border-radius: 4px;">

<p style="font-size: 12px; font-weight: bold; color: #3e3e3c; margin: 0 0 8px 0;">SDR 인계 사항</p>

<p style="font-size: 13px; color: #3e3e3c; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0;">{!Opportunity.SDR_Handover_Note__c}</p>

</div>

</div>

</div>

textTemplates.name: box4
textTemplates.text:
Client & Tour

{!Opportunity.Account.Name} — {!Opportunity.Name}

예산 (Budget)

{!Opportunity.Budget_Max__c}

인원

{!Opportunity.Headcount__c}

희망 지점/호실

{!Opportunity.Branch_Account__r.Name} / {!Opportunity.Asset__r.Name}
📢 SDR Note & AI Summary

{!Opportunity.SDR_Handover_Note__c}

📅 {!Opportunity.Tour_Date__c}
🔑 입주: {!Opportunity.Preferred_MoveIn_Date__c}
❤️ 선호: {!Opportunity.Preferences__c}
